itemDisplayName: Provision a function app on a dynamic hosting plan with source control
description: An ARM template from https://github.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates/tree/master/101-function-app-create-dynamic to set up a new functions app. I added to it a source control resource using https://github.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates/tree/master/201-web-app-github-deploy.
summary: Provision a function app on a dynamic hosting plan with source control
